name: browser-or-node

scripts.cover: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require babel-core/register --recursive
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
